$interpreted: Naya: CRAP!
Soldier: ARREST THE TRAITOR!
Angelia: Monsters...!?
Naya: Damnit, they must have flown into the Capitol from the big crack in the destroyed engine room!
Theodore: Angelia, your actions have caused me unfathomable sorrow...
Angelia: Uncle, my kidnapping...was it you?
Theodore: ...As there's no one else, I won't try to justify myself.
Naya: So it was you!
Angelia: Why? The uncle I've come to know was always so benevolent...
Theodore: Indeed, I have raised you like my own daughter. But you have been influenced by William far too much.
Theodore: The Kingdom of the Sun would never benefit from those impractical ideals of pacifism he advocates!
Angelia: The road to hell is paved with your so called "good" intentions. If armchair malice is our Kingdom's future, gloating over the pain of others,
Angelia: then I'd rather not!
Theodore: Garbage, just like your father, William!
Theodore: If we don't continue to strengthen our nation, we will soon fall prey to neighbouring countries!
Angelia: A strong nation, is one that safeguards the quality of life for ALL of its people! Noble or born among the slums!
Theodore: Those worms have enough to feast on the scraps we feed them!
Angelia: They have the same right as us to shine under the almighty sun!
Charle: (...Aosta, you better keep up your part of the plan...)
Aosta: ...Slow down the castle's speed? Surely there's only so much one can do?
Aosta: Oh, what a shame. Let's see how long you can hold on...

Model.Text: CRAP!
ARREST THE TRAITOR!
Monsters...!?
Damnit, they must have flown into the Capitol from the big crack in the destroyed engine room!
Angelia, your actions have caused me unfathomable sorrow...
Uncle, my kidnapping...was it you?
...As there's no one else, I won't try to justify myself.
So it was you!
Why? The uncle I've come to know was always so benevolent...
Indeed, I have raised you like my own daughter. But you have been influenced by William far too much.
The Kingdom of the Sun would never benefit from those impractical ideals of pacifism he advocates!
The road to hell is paved with your so called "good" intentions. If armchair malice is our Kingdom's future, gloating over the pain of others,
then I'd rather not!
Garbage, just like your father, William!
If we don't continue to strengthen our nation, we will soon fall prey to neighbouring countries!
A strong nation, is one that safeguards the quality of life for ALL of its people! Noble or born among the slums!
Those worms have enough to feast on the scraps we feed them!
They have the same right as us to shine under the almighty sun!
(...Aosta, you better keep up your part of the plan...)
...Slow down the castle's speed? Surely there's only so much one can do?
Oh, what a shame. Let's see how long you can hold on...
